credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Power--The Nerve Center of London's Underground
description: At center, a spinning black wheel from which extends a black arm with clenched hand. Lightning bolts issue from the fist. At upper right, a red power plant. Text, in red, blue, and black, left margin and lower portion: "POWER / THE / NERVE CENTER / OF LONDON'S / UNDERGROUND". Bottom margin:"17.1500.1/3 and VINCENT BROOKS, DAY & SON, LTD. LITH. LONSON. WC.2"
name: Poster
